channel.title: Set Party hat Mod only and Admin only?
channel.description: Hey there. I made an server a few days ago, and i would like to set so White party hat Mod only Yellow Admin / owner only. Where do i go to make that change?

item.title: Set Party hat Mod only and Admin only?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nico Mod Nico
item.description:
@Mod_Nico wrote:

Yeah your right why change, but thanks anyways mate.

Read full topic
item.source: Set Party hat Mod only and Admin only?

item.title: Set Party hat Mod only and Admin only?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Follow and make sure you get it, I’m not explaining any further.

Find this in your client class:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

Then, add this with the rest of the codes

if(wearID == #### && playerRights != #) { sM("You must be an @@@@@ to wear this"); return false; }

= Item Id

= Player rights (You can replace player rights with any token or variable such as… donator != 1 or something)

@@@@ = what you want it to say?

EDIT: Why would you want to do this anyway? Your economy is going to fail. Look at a private server community like a city and your the Government.

Read full topic
item.source: Set Party hat Mod only and Admin only?
